title: Recurring Transaction
description: Defines recurring financial transactions within the application.

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: ID of the account this transaction belongs to

categoryId.title: Category ID
categoryId.description: Category identifier for organizing the transaction. Can be null if not categorized.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction.

frequency.title: Transaction Frequency
frequency.description: Defines the base unit of time for the repetition.

interval.title: Frequency Interval
interval.description: Specifies the number of frequency units between each occurrence (e.g., every 2 weeks).

occurrences.title: Total Occurrences
occurrences.description: The total number of times the transaction should occur. Can be null if not specified.

startOn.title: Start Date
startOn.description: The date on which the recurring transaction series should begin.

endOn.title: End Date
endOn.description: The date on which the recurring transaction series should end. Can be null.

recurringTransactionState.title: Recurring Transaction State
recurringTransactionState.description: Current state of the recurring transaction series.
